data.title: Hudson Soft - Company
data.text:

Bomberman and Bonk might be dead, but Mario Party lives on!...

Pedro dons a red cap and a grass skirt as he returns to a series he loves dearly....

For cheap thrills, this is a pretty good place to start!...

by Andrew Brown -

Pedro's first experience with the Wii is deeply rooted in this TurboGrafx-16 classic....

We talk about what makes the game special, how it stacks up to Mario Party and Wii Party, and the future of the series....
